title: fix: Update to latest library version and use transitive dependency
message:
fix: Update to latest library version and use transitive dependency

RxFirebase 1.3.2 resolves the issue with Firebase query configurations
being lost when executing the reference, this will correctly introduce
message ordering by created date.

title: feat: Split post and repost methods
message:
feat: Split post and repost methods

Include further lambda methods with clear separation between posting
and reposting for single responsibility and no nullability. Includes
default values for Message builder method.

title: feat: Handle back press on chat activity
message:
feat: Handle back press on chat activity

When the user presses back, use the same login functionality as when
the user selects sign out from the overflow menu

title: feat: Anonymous login for debug builds
message:
feat: Anonymous login for debug builds

To further aid testing efforts anonymous sign is enabled for debug
builds, in addition to cleaning up some lambda methods and removal
of unnecessary inner classes.

title: feat: Update language level to Java 8
message:
feat: Update language level to Java 8

Facilitate the update of language level to Java 8 and inline lambdas
where possible by using Android gradle 2.4.0-alpha4 which allows
preliminary usage of Java 8 features.

Some extracted interface implementations can be removed as a result
of using lambda methods.

title: Introduce Dagger 2.10rc-2 bindings with updated Android processor
